properties.name: complex trait judgment task
properties.definition_text: This task aims to measure judgment in the domains of trustworthiness (social), attractiveness (social), happiness (affective), and cognitive age (cognitive). Participants are presented with stimuli are required to evaluate each voice based on 4 different questions: â(Who do you regard as) More trustworthy?,â âMore attractive?,â âHappier?,â and âOlder?.â Judgments may be made based on stimuli including voices, faces, or other characteristics.
